name: Snow Cast Away
description:
Let's play SnowCastAway! This game was specially made for the Unreal SpringJam 2020 in just 5 days!

Play as a squirrel which has lost its memory and forgot where he put the nuts for this winter; thankfully his accident gave it special powers to project its mind unto the future, and now he can see where the nuts will become trees if left untouched. Collect all the acorns in randomly generated scenes.

Unreal 4.25

Music by:
"Ambler" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
"Jaunty Gumption" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
"Thinking Music" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
